title: Music & Arts
part1: What kind of music do you enjoy?
Have you ever learned to play a musical instrument?
Do you like going to art galleries or museums?

part2.cue_card_topic: Describe a musical performance you enjoyed.
cue_card_points: what kind of music it was
and explain why you enjoyed it.

part3: How important is music in people's lives?
What role do the arts play in education?
Do you think music tastes change as people get older?
